column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bumi says : " You 're not gon na believe what just happened .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What is it ?
#Text=What 's wrong ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " The most amazing , wondrous , fantastical thing just occurred .
#Text=Okay , Bum - Ju and I had a little fight .
#Text=I made him this sweater , and he did n't seem to like it , and I 'll admit , it might need work , but it was my first attempt at knitting , so I was a little hurt .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Hilarious .
#Text=Time for dinner , everyone .
#Text=" Bumi says : " No , check this out .
#Text=I can airbend .
#Text=Yeah wait , seriously , I was doing it .
#Text=No hold on , I just uh , maybe if I - No .
#Text=I swear , I 'm not making it up .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Stop waving your arms around at the table .
#Text=It 's not funny anymore .
#Text=" Bumi says : " It 's not a joke .
#Text=" Korra says : " What 's up with him ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Bumi says he airbended earlier , but he ca n't now .
#Text=Oh , and I guess he 's not very good at knitting either .
#Text=I got ta say , I love being a part of this family .
#Text=You got the grumpy dad , the wacky uncle , the put - upon mom , crazy kids .
#Text=Well , that 's just great .
#Text=" Asami says : " Where 's Mako ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , you mean the brooding teenager ?
#Text=He 's staying in the police station .
#Text=" Korra says : " Still ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " I told him Tenzin invited us to stay here since our apartment is a vine habitat now , but , he said he had to focus on work .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Oh , did you see that ?
#Text=I think the napkin moved .
#Text=" Kya says : " You blew on it .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Wait !
#Text=Maybe I can only do it when my life is in danger .
#Text=Bolin , bend a giant boulder at me .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , I do n't think that 's a good idea .
#Text=" Pema says : " If you 're going to be bending giant boulders , you can do it outside .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No one is bending giant boulders !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Look alive , Uncle Bumi !
#Text=" Bumi says : " I told you !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Unbelievable .
#Text=You 're actually an airbender .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Wait 'till I tell Mom , she 's gon na love this .
#Text=" Mako says : " Ow !
#Text=Police .
#Text=He what ?
#Text=Slow down .
#Text=Okay , I 'm on my way .
#Text="
